action_chBox_gridSize(Event) - Method in class application.UIController
update the game class with new size of grid choosed
action_chBox_numPlayers(Event) - Method in class application.UIController
update the game class with new number of players choosed
action_colorPick(ActionEvent) - Method in class application.UIController
This method gets the color picker whose value changed and update it with settings class
addToHistory(int, int) - Method in class application.Game
This method is responsible for saving moves made by the user at each step
addToUi(GridPane, UIController) - Method in class application.Grid
Adds the current grid to ui as a child of pane grid defined by the ui
